title: The Italian AUGMENTED 6th [Explained By An Italian]

last_post.content:
I showed Lisa this video of Tommaso Zillio explaining a chord called the 'Italian 6th':

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=esjELnfFoLU

and she had a complaint: where the chords finally resolve to a C major triad, he writes the final chord as CCE - but those first two notes don't sound like they're an octave apart!

What do you think?

Just for my own sake, let me explain how an Italian 6th works.

(1/n)

Getty Images claims in a new lawsuit against Stability AI that output images are showing derivations of their watermark and thus violating their trademark.¹ (h/t @copyrightlately). Tangentially, this reminds me of Nintendo's strategy to stop unauthorized Game Boy publishers. The hardware checked cartridges for that iconic scrolling Nintendo logo on boot, allowing them to sue unapproved game devs who used it.² (h/t @stacksmashing)

¹ https://copyrightlately.com/pdfviewer/getty-images-v-stability-ai-complaint/
² https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ix5yZm4fwFQ

In AI Images Class 2, Cybernetic Serendipities, we look at the history of machines and metaphors for intelligence; moving to the transdisciplinarity of cybernetics, intermedia approaches of Fluxus, and democratization of Pop Art, to look at the way computers and art came together by 1968. https://youtu.be/VNVdN7Sf7wE #aiart #cyberneticserendipity #mediastudies

The first AI Images class is a short, high-level introduction to reading AI images as infographics. It compares news photographs to AI generated images, and AI images to John Snow’s map of the London cholera outbreak. It suggests that AI images fall somewhere between the two. https://youtu.be/GcZ1U-BAu1I #art #ai #dataviz

How do masks catch particles that are smaller than the holes?

1. Small particles are sticky because of static forces
2. Large particle go straight until they hit a mask layer
Tiny particles get knocked around by molecules until they hit a fibre
3. Fibres are given an electric charge so that they attract all particles

#MaskUp

https://youtu.be/eAdanPfQdCA

title: Langston Hughes reads The Negro Speaks of Rivers

last_post.content:
Today was my first time hearing Langston Hughes' voice. I'm glad I had the chance to listen to him reading one of his famous poems, which is apt for the first day of Black History Month in the United States, & since he was born on this day in 1901.

"I've known rivers:
I've known rivers ancient as the world and older than the
flow of human blood in human veins."

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8cKDOGhghMU

Finally watched @cldellow's video introduction to his datasette-scraper plugin and it is a really compelling demo! https://youtu.be/zrSGnz7ErNI

The plugin turns Datasette into a full web scraping environment, with the ability to configure crawls, watch your crawl queue and extract data from crawled pages into separate SQLite tables

It's really impressive, and also provides a fascinating example of advanced Datasette UI customization by a plugin

More info on the plugin here: https://datasette.io/plugins/datasette-scraper

title: The Cosmic Web, or: What does the universe look like at a VERY large scale?

last_post.content:
When I watch this video (Structure of the Universe / "The Cosmic Web") I think back to studying the book "Self Organization in Biological Systems" (Bonabeau, 2001) during grad school --- in how patterns emerge naturally at all levels of nature:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=74IsySs3RGU

Book link:

https://press.princeton.edu/books/paperback/9780691116242/self-organization-in-biological-systems

Additionally a 3d simulation / visualization tool for the cosmic web:

Half forgot and half didn't have time to say anything,
but tomorrow at 10AM UTC I'll be talking in the @qgis open day about some cool tricks you can do with geometry generator expressions.

Live YouTube link below

https://youtu.be/ybx_OKnD_pM

Quantum mechanics anyone? Dozens have been disappointed by UCLA’s administration ineptly standing in the way of Dr. Mike Miller being able to offer his perennial Winter UCLA math class (Ring Theory this quarter), so a few friends and I are putting our informal math and physics group back together.

We’re mounting a study group on quantum mechanics based on Peter Woit‘s Introduction to Quantum Mechanics course from 2022. We’ll be using his textbook Quantum Theory, Groups and Representations:An Introduction (free, downloadable .pdf) and his lectures from YouTube.

Shortly, we’ll arrange a schedule and some zoom video calls to discuss the material. If you’d like to join us, send me your email or leave a comment so we can arrange meetings (likely via Zoom or similar video conferencing).

Our goal is to be informal, have some fun, but learn something along the way. The suggested mathematical background is some multi-variable calculus and linear algebra. Many of us already have some background in Lie groups, algebras, and representation theory and can hopefully provide some help for those who are interested in expanding their math and physics backgrounds.

Everyone is welcome! 

#group-theory #lie-groups #peter-woit #physics #quantum-mechanics #representation-theory

https://boffosocko.com/2023/01/26/quantum-mechanics-study-group-for-peter-woit/

In a big chunk of the call, we discuss why a full-fledged OSS app like @elk is beneficial to the @vite, @nuxt, and Vue ecosystems.

Improvements to Vite plugins, Vue libs, and Nuxt modules (even new ones created from the App needs). And huge amount of DX and UX data to further enhance them and test new ideas in the future.

Some of the most active maintainers of plugins and modules have integrated their libs themselves into the project. Diving into the code base of Elk could help you learn more about these tools and how they play together.

Netter Arte-Beitrag zu #Lovecraft und seinem Werk mit einer ganz merkwürdigen Aussprache von #Cthulhu in der deutschen Fassung: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M_eZ8naoluw

Leider keine Erwähnung von Lovecrafts rassistischen und antisemitischen Positionen.

Und: Gibt es eigentlich eine kritische #DigitaleEdition zum Lovecraft-Werk? Und/oder eine #Briefedition zu den Lovecraft-Korrespondenzen? Hat da nicht mal jemand Lust drauf? Frag für nen Freund. 🤪

3. Third Nations need to work at not being Thucydides-irrelevant, but to talk about what matters to them: national sovereignty, territorial integrity, a level playing field.
